DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Prospectively evaluate safety efficacy Ahmed Glaucoma Drainage Device , model M4 compare model S2 . Method : Mexican patient Neovascular Glaucoma randomly include group ( M4 S2 ) . They operate use conventional technique create sub-episcleral tunnel place valve 's tube anterior chamber . They monitor one year result evaluate respect postoperative reduction pressure , change visual acuity , need drug complication , addition demographic characteristic group .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study , Safety Efficacy , Ahmed Glaucoma Drainage Device , Model M4 Model S2 Neovascular Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosis Neovascular glaucoma High IOP despite topical treatment Pregnant woman Mental disorder Previous glaucoma surgery Patients old 18 year
